    • Know Me!!

    Hi!! You have reached "Manas Vashistha". Feel free to wander around and explore.

    I am an undergraduate at the Indian Institute of Technology Bombay (IITB). I am fundamentally interested in the field of machine learning and its applications. Most of my projects include applications of Computer Vision and Deep Learning. I am a vegetarian but, that does not make me anything less than a foodie. I plan on travelling all over the world. That was a short intro, you can know more about me here.
